ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: from the evil of what He has created
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: From the evil of what He has created,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: from the evil of all that He created;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: against the evil of whatever He has created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “From the evil of His entire creation.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: From the evil of what He has created,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: From the evil of what He has created,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: from the evil of what He has created,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: From the evil of that which He created;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: from the evil of what He has created,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: From the evil of that which He hath created,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: from the evil of what He has created,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: From the mischief of created things;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: From the evil of what He has created;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: from the evil of what He has created,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: From the evil of what He created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: From the evil of that which He created
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [113:2] from the evil of what He has created, of obligated animate beings and non-obligated ones and from all inanimates, such as poison and so on;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (From the evil of that which He created) from the evil of any from among His creation that possesses evil;
